Workouts of the Day

Form is key. It‘s not what you do—it‘s how you do it that matters most

tap the ? to watch form tips
Natural Leg Extensions ?
slow & controlled on ground; don’t over-extend
4 sets
10 reps
Leg Press ?
full range of motion but don't lock knees; less weight ok
4 sets
15 reps
Hack Squat ?
barbell or smith machine
4 sets
15 reps
Leg Curl ?
seated or regular machine
4 sets
15 reps
Adductors ?
inner thigh machine; lower weight higher reps
4 sets
25 reps
Barbell Squats (Wide) ?
squat rack preferred; smith machine ok
4 sets
10 reps
Barbell Squats (Narrow) ?
squat rack preferred; smith machine ok
4 sets
10 reps
Barbell Deadlifts ?
squat rack preferred; smith machine ok; lighter weights
4 sets
15 reps
Russian Twists ?
optional weight or med ball
4 sets
50 reps
